co.uk.niadel.mpi.asm

Class ASMRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.asm.ASMRegistry

  • public final class ASMRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Where your register stuff to do with ASM in N-API.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.List<IASMTransformer> asmTransformers
      The list of ASM transformers registered.
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> excludedClasses
      A list of fully qualified class names that cannot be transformed, at least via the N-API approved method.

      • invokeAllTransformers

        @MPIAnnotations.Internal
public static final void invokeAllTransformers()
        Calls all register transformers' manipulateBytecodes method, getting the requested bytes specified by each transformer.

      • addASMClassExclusion

        public static final void addASMClassExclusion(java.lang.String excludedName)
        Adds a class to exclude from transforming. You can add important MPI classes to this.
        Parameters:
        excludedName -

      • isClassExcluded

        public static final boolean isClassExcluded(java.lang.String name)
        Gets whether or not the specified class is excluded from ASM transformers.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the class to check, the fully qualified name.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the class is excluded.
